REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1658 reute h f BC-REXNORD-<REX>-SEES-MA 03-19 0049

TEXT.TITLE: REXNORD <REX> SEES MAY MERGER WITH BANNER <BNR>
TEXT.BODY: Rexnord Inc said it expects to merge with a wholly-owned subsidiary of Banner Industries Inc in early May. Late last month, Banner said it completed a tender offer for and held 96 pct of Rexnord's common shares. Reuter
